quest.name: The Show Must Go On
journal:
The Crystal Caravan leader is ready to put on the show of a lifetime.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

The stage has been set, and the Crystal Caravan has put their expectations squarely on your shoulders. As an eager audience gathers to watch the play, the troupe's carpenter awaits to help you make the final preparations.

※Please note that you will not be able to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, check the Lodestone.

You overcome several bouts of stage fright to give a performance sure to be remembered for moons to come. The crowd's applause fills you with a sense of profound accomplishment. Of course, it could not hurt to hear the opinion of a professional. Seek out the Crystal Caravan leader to see if your acting is up to her standards.

Your performance is met with acclaim by all who viewed it. However, the festivities are not over, and there are still many who have yet to see your dramatic take on the Calamity. If you should wish to reprise your role, the Crystal Caravan will welcome you with open arms.
objectives: Speak with the Crystal Caravan carpenter to start the play.
Speak with the Crystal Caravan leader.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: Your performance was lauded by all, but none had more praise than the playwright himself! He was so moved, in fact, that he wishes to offer you his personal thanks. He said he'd be waiting somewhere near the Wellhead Lift.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The quest “The Show Must Go On” may be repeated after completing the quest “After the Curtain Falls.”

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: Ready to take the stage, are we? Our preparations should be more or less complete. Whenever you're ready, our carpenter is waiting near the wings to let you on the stage.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: You wish to reprise your role? Well, who am I to deny our star? If you would reenact the Calamity again, our carpenter will gladly let you on the stage.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: Remember, all we ask is that you give us your most heartfelt performance, and return here once you've finished. Oh, and don't forget─our future is riding on your shoulders!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: I'm sure you'll do great! The worst I've ever seen an audience do was pelt the performers with popotoes. Ah, but of course, I'm sure that won't happen today!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNFLYMAN
dialogue.text: Ready to take the stage, eh? Just change into your costume, and you'll be ready to start the show. Took me a bit of work to adjust it to your size─let's hope it brings out the hero in you!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNFLYMAN
dialogue.text: Now, the rest of us will be following your lead, but don't put too much pressure on yourself. We're professionals, after all. Just act from the heart and we'll make the best of it like we always do. Now go on, and good luck!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNFLYMAN
dialogue.text: Couldn't get enough of the applause, eh? I know that feeling! Now, you know where the costume is. Go on─the adoring crowd is waiting!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNFLYMAN
dialogue.text: Let the play begin! I'll be cheering from the wings!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: It was the year 1572 of the Sixth Astral Era. A terrible catastrophe known as the Calamity threatened to bring untold destruction to Eorzea.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: At the same time, the Garlean Empire overran the Carteneau Flats. The three great city–states formed a grand alliance, that they might repel the aggressors and see their peoples through these dark times.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: Among the many who fought that day was a warrior whose noble deeds gave others the courage to carry on. A warrior who was willing to sacrifice herselfhimself to save the many.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)A Warrior of Light.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEEL
dialogue.text: (-Commanding Female Voice-)Proud sons and daughters of Garlemald! We shall purge this land of its blight! But first, let us crush its pathetic army under the heels of our boots!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)The two armies clashed under the specter of the sanguine moon. The Warrior of Light led a band of hardened adventurers into the desperate melee, trying to stem the tide of the relentless onslaught.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)They fought on until flagging and weary. The moon of Dalamud waxed ever fuller, at last bursting open to reveal the terrifying truth of what slumbered inside.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: The dreadwyrm, Bahamut!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: It was...uh...

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)Yes! From within the flaming moon emerged the dread primal Bahamut!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)Freed at last from his prison, he unleashed his seething rage upon the land, engulfing Eorzea in flames!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)Our intrepid hero was helpless in the face of such power, and the force of Bahamut's assault left herhim battered and breathless.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)But just as the sun was to set on Eorzea's fate, a voice called out, saving our brave champions from certain doom!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)It was...an enormous cat!?

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)As round as the red moon and nigh as large, it fell to the ground, the impact of its landing knocked soldiers on both sides to the ground!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)And then, uh... Their hearts having been melted by the sight of such a cuddly creature, Garleans and Eorzeans alike lost the will to fight! They cast down their weapons, and embraced each other as brother and sister, returning home without further bloodshed!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)The gargantuan feline, moved by this display of camaraderie, purred with joy! Why, it's purring right now! Can you hear that? It's the sound of...the sound of peace.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)Dalamud burnt blood red, and just as the tendrils of its flames reached out to engulf the land, down descended the Archon Louisoix from the heavens! He had come to save Eorzea!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)I said he came from the heavens! Louisoix came to save Eorzea!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNMENTOR
dialogue.text: (-Dignified Male Voice-)Ahem! If it is the dreadwyrm Bahamut you fear, then fear no longer. I stole upon him whilst he was in a deep sleep. The battle was short, and I emerged victorious. From his meat did I concoct a stew most hearty, and from his bones did I mix a salve to soothe all wounds.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)You ate him!? I...I mean, and so did Louisoix consume the heart of his enemy, and thus averted the Calamity! With the medicine made from the dragon's bones, the Archon added years to the lives of Eorzea's people!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)...And all lived happily ever after. A wonderful story indeed. However, it's not exactly the one I remember hearing...

dialogue.name: NEWBORNMENTOR
dialogue.text: (-Chocobo Call-)Kweh!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)...A chocobo chick? I mean, of course it was a chocobo chick! Large as a dragon grown! From high in the heavens it tumbled, the earth quaking as it landed!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)A deafening kweh echoed across the battlefield, and with a violent kick of its legs, the chocobo sent both armies reeling to the ground!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)Thus did the Battle of Carteneau come to a decisive end! Eorzea was spared destruction, and the chocobo chick hailed as savior of the realm!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Chocobo Call-)Kweh! Kweh! Kweh!

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: It was the voice of the Archon Louisoix!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: It was the voice of...uh...

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: The wandering minstrel sang out for them!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)Indeed, it was the Archon Louisoix's voice that called out over the endless battlefield. The erudite scholar and compassionate commander, who came from far-flung Sharlayan to deliver us to salvation.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNMENTOR
dialogue.text: (-Dignified Male Voice-)Twelve above, I beseech Thee! Lend me Your strength, and seal Bahamut within Dalamud once more!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)But lo! Bahamut's power was too great, and Louisoix's ritual failed!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)The end of Eorzea was at hand. But in that moment of darkest despair, the Archon entreated the gods once more...

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)Hearkening to his plea, They imbued the Warrior of Light with Their divine strength. Once more, our hero rose, and stood unflinching against Bahamut!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)A voice called out, piercing the chaos of the battlefield. The voice of none other than...another Warrior of Light!?

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEEL
dialogue.text: (-Heroic Female Voice-)Be gone, vile beast! You shall threaten the realm no longer!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)In defense of her fallen comrade, the stalwart warrior stood valiantly against Bahamut! From whence did this mysterious ally come? None can recall, but the fatal blow struck against the mighty dragon resounds to this day!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEEL
dialogue.text: (-Heroic Female Voice-)Darkness shall flee before the Light of my blade!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)That was amazing! I mean... Thus was Bahamut laid low, and the realm saved! Three cheers for the Warrior of Light!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)The voice that called out to our desperate warrior was none other than...a cheerleader!? Yes, a cheerleader, whose invigorating words filled our hero with determination anew!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEEL
dialogue.text: (-Enthusiastic Female Voice-)Get up! Get up and fight! Show us your might! Show the realm who's the Warrior of Light!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)Heartened by the earnest encouragement, our savior stood undaunted against Bahamut! With a single blow, shehe laid low the dread primal once and for all!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)With a cheerleader by your side, there's no limit to what you can achieve! Just ask the Warrior of Light! And as it happens, the Crystal Caravan is now selling a limited supply. Yes, you too can have the courage to save the realm for just a few coins!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: The voice which called out for our hero was...our carpenter!? What in the seven hells are you doing!?

dialogue.name: NEWBORNFLYMAN
dialogue.text: Apologies, Chief, but the fireworks ain't...uh, firin' the way they should. I take pride in my craft, ye see. I just can't let such a thing stand without at least an honest attempt at fixin' it.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: And this is your idea of fixing things!? Barging onto the stage like a goobbue run amok!?

dialogue.name: NEWBORNFLYMAN
dialogue.text: By the gods!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: Would you look at that, everyone? Impeccable craftsmanship! So impeccable that the realm was saved! And with that, today's show shall come to a close. Thank you, thank you one and all!

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Bahamut was slain with a single blow!

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: They, uh...

dialogue.name: NEWBORNMENTOR
dialogue.text: (-Dignified Male Voice-)Brave champions, I leave the rest in your hands! If I can but see you to a new future, I should want for nothing more.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)Louisoix's final words joined the prayers of every Eorzean, and the Twelve bestowed upon the Warrior of Light Their blessing.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNMENTOR
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)With the fate of the realm resting on herhis shoulders, our hero lashed out with one last desperate attack, imbued with the power of the gods themselves.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)Louisoix enveloped the Warrior of Light in magic, whisking herhim away to safety.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)Woe unto us! Our saviors have gone! Who shall save us now!? It is hopeless!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNMENTOR
dialogue.text: (-Dignified Male Voice-)Brave champions, I leave the rest in your hands! If I can but see you to a new future, I should want for nothing more.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)Louisoix's incantation revitalized the Warrior of Light, and with a newfound tenacity shehe fixed herhis smoldering gaze upon the dragon...

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)And in a flash Bahamut was defeated! The Warrior of Light was...surprised herhis foe was felled so easily...

dialogue.name: NEWBORNMENTOR
dialogue.text: (-Bestial Male Voice-)You shall rue the day you stood against me, foolish mortals!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNMENTOR
dialogue.text: (-Bestial Male Voice-)Tremble before me─Bahamut Omega! Tremble, and despair, for I am not the only dragon you must contend with! With my savage roar, I summon Bahamut Alpha, and Bahamut Beta, and Bahamut─

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: No, no, no! We don't have all the puppets for─I mean... And so he spoke, on and on, until Bahamut named all of his kin. In fact, some say he is still talking to this day...

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)Reinvigorated by the Archon's prayer, the Warrior of Light rose anew. SheHe turned to face the dread Bahamut, and unleashed herhis most powerful weapon: a single pithy quote!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNMENTOR
dialogue.text: (-Heroic Male Voice-)You don't need a reason to help people!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEEL
dialogue.text: (-Heroic Female Voice-)You don't need a reason to help people!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: Bahamut was overwhelmed by the empathetic words of a legendary thief! So moved was he that his breath caught in his throat, leaving him unable to wreak any more havoc unto Eorzea! Huzzah!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNFLYMAN
dialogue.text: Now that was a round of applause well deserved! Seeing you move so passionately on that stage was enough to inspire even me to consider taking up acting.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: Thank you, adventurer! Somehow, we finished the play without any major incidents. However, I'm not entirely sure our...uh, dramatic interpretation of the Calamity was true to the facts. Let's hope the public doesn't think we meant to deceive them.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: Now, I have no doubt you're quite tired after such an impassioned performance. Take some time and rest, and speak to me again when you've recovered.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNMENTOR
dialogue.text: (-Dignified Male Voice-)Eorzea is saved! Warrior of Light, the realm is in your debt!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNMENTOR
dialogue.text: (-Dignified Male Voice-)The threat has been vanquished, and hope can return to the hearts of the people! The bravery of our hero shall illuminate the future of the realm!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: (-Singsong Voice-)The seemingly indomitable Bahamut vanished in a brilliant flash of light! Once more, hope returned to the hearts of Eorzea's people!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text:
(-Singsong Voice-)Unto chaos and despair came hope,♪
a dawn to banish the night.♪
A hero is come to our realm.♪
Hail the Warrior of Light!♪
So long as this hero stands with us, the future of Eorzea shall ever shine bright.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: I knew you'd be a success up there! Even so, I didn't expect you'd do that well! You have our thanks, adventurer!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNFLYMAN
dialogue.text: They're still clapping! Well, what're you waiting for? Go back out there and give your adoring fans what they want!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: You're still new to all this, aren't you? It's called a curtain call! Now's your chance to bask in a well-deserved applause. Show the crowd your lovely face!

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEEL
dialogue.text: Would you listen to that? How long do you think they would clap if shehe remained on the stage?

dialogue.name: NEWBORNMENTOR
dialogue.text: For as long as shehe deserves, I gather. It is not often one has the opportunity to be in the presence of such a radiant actor. It is as if the Warrior of Light herselfhimself was standing there.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text:
(-Singsong Voice-)Stray seeds quicken in ash's grey embrace.
Valiant blades forged under the Twelve's good grace.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: That voice, it is honey to my ears... Whose could it be?

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)Why, what an unexpected turn of events! A bard sang out for our hero, and his heavenly voice gave herhim the will to rise again!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: What say you, friend? Do you find despair in these words, or hope? More often than not, the meaning of prophecy lies in the hearts of those who hear it. So close your eyes, and envision the future you desire.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Warrior of Light, to save Eorzea, you must pray fervently for a brighter tomorrow! Unfetter your heart and embrace hope, and adventurers far and wide shall add their voices to yours!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)As Bahamut's flames lay waste to the land, thousands cried out, certain that the end was nigh. But the Warrior of Light rose from the ashes, unburnt and unbroken. And shehe prayed.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Although none can know what is to come, I swear that you shall always have my support. I entrust the future of Eorzea to you, brave hero.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: (-Narrator-)And so, heartened by the minstrel's words, and emboldened by the prayers of many, the Warrior of Light felled the fearsome Bahamut with a single blow!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: My apologies─I could not resist the urge to take the stage once you spoke of me! Stirring as it is to hear tales of heroism, sometimes one must be the hero! Although 'twas only on the stage, I thank you for allowing me to live out that dream.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Eorzea has suffered countless hardships, and will doubtless suffer many more. I hold no dread in my heart, however, for I believe you shall lead the way to a brighter tomorrow.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text:
'Neath pillars of whorling strife,♪
founders the dross of despair.♪
O'er pillars of eddying life,♪
surge high the gales of prayer.♪

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text:
Flux and flow do the gyres,♪
joined by the crystal in thy keep.♪
Thy adamant spear bores steeps entire,♪
thy argent blade cleaves oceans deep.♪

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Tell me true, friend─were my words to your liking? It is a poem of gratitude and hope. Gratitude for the past and for the present, and hope for the future. A hope which I am certain you shall help fulfill.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNFLYMAN
dialogue.text: I've been at this a long time, and that was among the most movin' performances I've seen. I've no doubt the chief feels the same way, too.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: I must say, you certainly exceeded our expectations! Perhaps our little accident before was but a blessing in disguise? Either way, I offer you my thanks, on behalf of every member of the Crystal Caravan.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: And it would seem you have one particularly passionate fan that would offer you his personal thanks. He has left a message just for you.

dialogue.name: NEWBORNHEAD
dialogue.text: Once again you've captured the hearts of the audience! I daresay this play was even more enthralling than the last. I await your next performance with bated breath!
